entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is described as hysterical and peering anxiously around the corner. She is also referred to as 'she' throughout the passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as pulling one of Dudley's massive arms around his own shoulders and dragging him toward the road. He is also referred to as 'he' throughout the passage.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as having a massive arm that Harry pulls around his own shoulders. He is also referred to as 'him' throughout the passage.

entities.name: wisteria walk
entities.description: Wisteria Walk is mentioned as the location where Harry and Dudley are walking with Mrs. Figg.

relationships.description: Harry is carrying Dudley along the road, as described in the passage: 'Harry pulled one of Dudleyâ€™s massive arms around his own shoulders and dragged him toward the road...'
Mrs. Figg is following Harry and Dudley, as described in the passage: 'Mrs. Figg tottered along in front of them...'
